Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Hey, Simon! By the looks of the stuff here, I think we made it to the database room.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Hang on, let me have a look...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Hey, Diana. Are you familiar with this system?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Only just a thing or two.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "I'll give you a hand, too!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After securing the server in the research lab, Simon immediately set about looking for intel on Amberia.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Not technologically inclined and unable to help, Rosetta is in the room lost in thought.'}
{2: "What's on your mind?", 3: '10', 4: 'Tired?', 5: '11'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I was just thinking about how many Forest Guards were born here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I may be labeled a sinner all the same, but I don't carry the same weight as Diana and the others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I was modified because of other reasons. After I was reborn, I've been fighting ever since.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "After all this fighting, I may have gotten stronger. But I still can't change my misfortune...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'And when I met you and Alpha, I really thought that was the end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But I survived, and then I had to face Alpha again. Then this time, I thought it would just be a few minor skirmishes...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Who'd have thought? We're now up against that Amberia in the legends.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's just a coincidence.", 3: '18', 4: "Looks like we're all unlucky.", 5: '18'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "...Of course, I by no means think I'm special. I'm just used to it is all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But enough about me... If the problem can be really solved this time, the Forest Guards can finally rest at ease.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why?', 3: '20', 4: "But we can't tell anyone about Amberia. Can we?", 5: '21'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: '...Bygones can finally be bygones. And we can bring an end to the nightmare known as Amberia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It doesn't matter. What matters is that we put the past to rest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'In fact, many people in the ARU think that the "tide" is just a ruse by the Forest Guard to ensure our status.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "They're always afraid that we will become the next Amberia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "They've always been in fear, in fear that another Amberia will rise in the ARU.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Fearing... even with that master code they programmed us with—the code to make us listen to their commands.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'However, not a single Forest Guard wishes to harm each other, because "even amid torrential snow and wind, the Forest Guard\'s honor stands strong."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "This is an old saying among the Forest Guard... Well, I guess the Forest Guard aren't exactly that old.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: 'So... Why did they turn you into Constructs? If they fear the power of humanoid-hybrids, then why would they continue making them?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "There wasn't a choice. The Punishing Virus poses a terrifying threat.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Corrupted invasions are rare for the ARU, but not nonexistent. We're far from safe...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "You could use ordinary machines to deal with the tide. If you can't defeat them, you can always just run. After all, the tide will eventually recede.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "That, however, is not an option for the Corrupted. So, there's no choice but to use Constructs...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'You\'re walking a fine line... Then how do you stop humanoid-hybrid frames from going "berserk?"', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'As long as the frames are made more "human-like," it\'ll be fine—or so I\'ve heard... But I\'m afraid only the higher-ups know the technical details.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The Arctic Route Union... has been, and is still trapped in the nightmare known as "Amberia". Everyone has lost hope.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'If we really can get rid of Amberia... The Forest Guards and the ARU as a whole can start looking toward the future.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant, sorry for asking you this right now—but will you help us bring an end to the nightmare that plagues this land?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course.', 3: '37', 4: "That's what I've been doing.", 5: '38'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Thank you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yes, you're right.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: 'Everyone, I found files on Amberia!', 4: '1'}
{3: "After searching for some time, Simon jumps in and interrupts your conversation. He points to some records on the screen showing Amberia's true form."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Can... can you still call her a humanoid-hybrid?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Your eyes are immediately taken by a figure with a tar-black mass for a lower body on the screen. Your skin crawls at the sight of her almost insectile hands and deconstructional mechanisms.'}
{3: 'A giant woman is connected to the front of the black lower body. You roughly make out that this is a humanoid structure left to synchronize the M.I.N.D.'}
{3: 'Yet, even this humanoid figure does not invoke relief. The bundles of installments and devices jutting out of her only serve to enhance its uncanniness.'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'This is too much... Even if she never went berserk because of some bug... to see herself become such a monstrosity...', 4: '2'}
{3: '——You would definitely go mad.'}
{3: "The chamber remains silent, but the same thought lingers in everyone's mind."}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'As long as the frames are made more "human-like," huh... But they... they\'ve turned Amberia into a monster.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Reading through the data, you learn that the Forest Guard's Construct framework is a subsidiary form of the technology used to create Amberia."}
{3: 'Only intentionally downgraded.'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: '...Anyway, the most important information is on the next page.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Simon could barely maintain composure at the grotesque figure on the screen. With an already pale face, he stifles his urge to vomit and scrolls to the next entry.'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Secret Entry 618—Code.'}
{3: "Here is a detailed account of Amberia's control system configuration. The final entry outlined the specifics on what exactly her code entailed."}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "The obsolete bionic series—Derek. It's voice is the code...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "The code is... Derek's voice?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Everyone finds their mouth agape. Except Simon, who, without a single clue, is waiting for someone's explanation."}
{2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'ROAR!!!'}
{3: 'A sudden roar of the bionics removes the room out of its reverie. Immediately following the roar, tremors from fracturing glaciers cause the room to tremble.'}
{2: "What's going on outside?", 3: '61', 4: 'Return to the base—NOW!', 5: '3000'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'A horde of bionics are rushing ashore... Based on their direction, they seem to be targeting the residential regions!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "They're targeting the residential regions this time... Commandant, we need to hurry back!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: "Yeah. Let's rush back and protect the others!", 4: '1'}
